universeBanner: Select a universe to start your adventure. You can change universe at anytime.

universes.title: Discover Universes
universes.description: Universes are the point to start.

knowledgeTemple.title: Discover the Knowledge Temple
knowledgeTemple.description: Curation of the best ressources for Designers.

quiz.title: How comfortable are you with Figma's basic tools and interface?
Have you used Figma's advanced features such as Auto Layout, or Prototyping ?
How experienced are you in Creating Design Systems and Components in Figma
How experienced are you in Creating Design Systems and Components in Figma

universes.title: Neophyte Nexus
universes.description: If you start with Figma, this Universe is made for you.

dungeons.title: The Begining
dungeons.description: Get ready to embark on a learning journey like no other.

stages.title: Create a Responsive Header
stages.description: Learn to use Auto Layout to create a responsive header section for a website

story.title: Story
story.description: You've been tasked with designing a website for a new restaurant.</br> The homepage should have a header section with the restaurant's logo and navigation links.</br> Your goal is to use Auto Layout to ensure that the header looks consistent and well-arranged across different screen sizes, from desktop to mobile.

stages.title: Designing a Multi-Platform Social Media Management Interface

quizs.title: Which advanced feature in Figma allows you to define complex conditional interactions based on user input or device orientation?
Which advanced featur in Figma allows you to define complex conditional interactions based on user input or device orientation?
Which advanced feature in Figma allows you to define complex conditional interactions based on user input or device orientation?

stages.title: Designing a Multi-Platform Social Media Management Interface
stages.description: In this exercise, you will dive into the realm of e-commerce by designing a sophisticated product catalog named "ShopHub" that demonstrates the capabilities of Figma's advanced features: variables, variants, modes, and Auto Layout. The goal is to create an immersive and responsive shopping experience that showcases products with variable pricing and adapts seamlessly to different devices.

steps.title: Dynamic Pricing and Product Customization
steps.description: Design an e-commerce catalog where users can explore products with variable pricing based on selected options.
helps: Define pricing variables: Set up variables for product prices and options (e.g., size, color).
Create product variants: Design product cards with variants reflecting different pricing options and attributes.

steps.title: Interactive Product Exploration
steps.description: Develop interactive components that allow users to explore product details and view multiple images.
helps: Define pricing variables: Set up variables for product prices and options (e.g., size, color).
Create product variants: Design product cards with variants reflecting different pricing options and attributes.

steps.title: Dynamic Pricing and Product Customization
steps.description: Design an e-commerce catalog where users can explore products with variable pricing based on selected options.
helps: Define pricing variables: Set up variables for product prices and options (e.g., size, color).
Create product variants: Design product cards with variants reflecting different pricing options and attributes.

stages.title: Designing a Full website
stages.description: In this exercise, you will create a full website that is responsive.
tips: Use the Ctrl + / shortcut to bring up the shortcuts menu.
Explore the "Figma Tips" available on the Figma website for quick insights.

stages.title: Designing a Multi-Platform Social Media Management Interface
stages.description: In this exercise, you will dive into the realm of e-commerce by designing a sophisticated product catalog named "ShopHub" that demonstrates the capabilities of Figma's advanced features: variables, variants, modes, and Auto Layout. The goal is to create an immersive and responsive shopping experience that showcases products with variable pricing and adapts seamlessly to different devices.
